item.title: Gluster Tips
item.description: Gluster Tips Setting Gluster Up for RHV Host # yum install glusterfs-server -y # service glusterd start # gluster v create vmstore localhost:/your/brick force # gluster v start vmstore # mount -t glusterfs localhost:/vmstore /var/lib/libvirt/images # gluster v set vmstore group virt Adjust ownership to qemu user # gluster volume set gkvms storage.owner-uid 36 # gluster volume set gkvms storage.owner-gid 36 Stop glusterd. This little bash script ensures it’s all down.
